title: Connecting to CarPlay Unit
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the user is in a car that supports CarPlay
custom_steps: When the user connects the device to CarPlay
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a CarPlay splash screen on the device
and the MLB app available on the CarPlay display

title: Launching App from CarPlay Display
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When the user taps on the MLB app icon on the CarPlay display
custom_expected:
Then the MLB app launches on the device
and the available feeds are listed on the CarPlay display

title: No Audio Available
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps:
When there are no audio feeds available yet on a given day
and the user views the CarPlay display
custom_expected: Then the user will see a message that there are no audio feeds available

title: List of Games with Audio
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When there are audio feeds available on a given day
custom_expected: Then the user will see a list of the game matchups on the CarPlay display

title: Game Matchup Display
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps:
When there are audio feeds available on a given day
and the user is viewing the list of game matchups on the CarPlay display
custom_expected: Then the user will see the correct team logos, names, and inning information for each game

title: Tapping Game from List
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When the user taps on a game from the list in the CarPlay display
custom_expected: Then the next screen will display the available audio feeds for that game

title: Tapping on Audio Feed
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps:
When the user has selected a game from the game list
and is viewing the available audio feeds for that game
and taps on a feed
custom_expected:
Then a screen with the game matchup and feed details will appear
and the feed will start playing on the CarPlay

title: Pause Button
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to an audio feed via CarPlay
and taps the Pause button
custom_expected: Then the audio feed will pause

title: Resume from Pause
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to an audio feed via CarPlay
and has paused the feed via the Pause button
and taps on the Play button
custom_expected: Then the audio feed will resume playback

title: Lite/Free User
custom_preconds:
Given MLB app is installed on a device
and the device is connected to CarPlay
and the user is not entitled for MLB Audio
custom_steps: When the user launches the MLB App via CarPlay
custom_expected: Then the user receives a message that an Audio subscription is required

title: Playback with Ads Disabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ Note: The audio EPG player does not utilize the DAI playback URL and does fallback to the fastly/media-cdn URL

AND

+ The user is logged into an account with VIDEO_ADS_DISABLED

Account: adsDisabled@gmail.com/PasswordDM5

OR

+ The user locally maps "adsEnabled": false for the media gateway return in Proxy
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch an audio only feed while utilizing the MLB app in their vehicle's Carplay feature
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should receive audio playback without any issues

AND

+ The user will NOT observe an authorization error in the audio player
